item.title: Health effects of untreated drinking water
item.description: Infections by type of pathogen 2.1 Protozoan 2.2 Bacterial 2.3 Viral 2.4Algal   Leptospiridium https://www.nbcnews.com/storyline/puerto-rico-crisis/puerto-ricans-risk-waterborne-disease-outbreaks-wake-hurricane-maria-n814461   Cholera http://www.who.int/csr/don/11-september-2015-cholera/en/   Dysentary and Dehydration   Guiardia / Amoebic Dysintary / BioRisk Reduction http://www.who.int/csr/bioriskreduction/en/
